      • base31Decode

        public static long base31Decode(String input)
        Convert a base 31 number containing chars 0123456789ABCDEFGHJKMNPQRTVWXYZ to numeric value.
        Parameters:
        input - base 31 number
        Returns:
        numeric value
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If input contains illegal chars

      • base31Encode

        public static String base31Encode(long input)
        Convert a numeric value to base 31 number using chars 0123456789ABCDEFGHJKMNPQRTVWXYZ.
        Parameters:
        input - numeric value
        Returns:
        base 31 number

      • cacheCodeToCacheId

        public static long cacheCodeToCacheId(String cacheCode)
        Convert cache code GCxxx to numeric cache id.

        The algorithm respects following rules used for cache code:
        • GC0 - GCFFFF = value after GC prefix is a hexadecimal number
        • GCG000 - ... = value after GC is a base 31 number minus magic constant 411120 (16 * 31 * 31 * 31 - 16 * 16 * 16 * 16)
        Parameters:
        cacheCode - cache code including GC prefix
        Returns:
        cache id
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Cache code does not contains GC prefix or contains invalid characters
        See Also:
        base31Decode(String)

      • cacheIdToCacheCode

        public static String cacheIdToCacheCode(long cacheId)
        Convert a numeric cache id to cache code GCxxx. The algorithm respects rules for generating cache code.
        Parameters:
        cacheId - cache id
        Returns:
        cache code including GC prefix
        See Also:
        cacheCodeToCacheId(String), base31Encode(long)

      • isCacheCodeValid

        public static boolean isCacheCodeValid(String cacheCode)
        Returns true if the cache code is valid. The algorithm respects rules for cache code.
        Parameters:
        cacheCode - cache code
        Returns:
        true if cache code is valid, otherwise false
        See Also:
        cacheCodeToCacheId(String)
